Public NotInheritable Class DBNull Implements IConvertible, ISerializable
public ref class DBNull sealed : IConvertible, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type DBNull = class interface IConvertible interface ISerializable
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DBNull extends System.Object implements class System.IConvertible, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type DBNull = class interface ISerializable interface IConvertible

span.span: Represents a nonexistent value.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示不存在的值。The class represents a nonexistent value. 例如，在数据库中，表行中的列可能不包含任何数据。In a database, for example, a column in a row of a table might not contain any data whatsoever. 也就是说，列被视为根本不存在，而不只是没有值。That is, the column is considered to not exist at all instead of merely not having a value. 对象表示不存在的列。A object represents the nonexistent column. 此外，COM 互操作使用 类来区分 VT_NULL 变量（指示不存在的值）和 VT_EMPTY 变量，这表示未指定的值。Additionally, COM interop uses the class to distinguish between a VT_NULL variant, which indicates a nonexistent value, and a VT_EMPTY variant, which indicates an unspecified value. 类型为单一实例类，这意味着只存在一个 对象。The type is a singleton class, which means only one object exists. 成员表示唯一的 对象。The member represents the sole object. 可用于显式将不存在的值分配给数据库字段，不过，大多数 ADO.NET 数据访问接口 在字段没有有效值时自动分配值。 can be used to explicitly assign a nonexistent value to a database field, although most ADO.NET data providers automatically assign values of when a field does not have a valid value. 您可以 通过将字段的值传递给方法来确定从数据库字段中检索到的值是否是一个值 `DBNull.Value.Equals` 。You can determine whether a value retrieved from a database field is a value by passing the value of that field to the `DBNull.Value.Equals` method. 但是，某些语言和数据库对象提供一些方法，使您可以更轻松地确定数据库字段的值是否为 。However, some languages and database objects supply methods that make it easier to determine whether the value of a database field is . 其中包括 Visual Basic `IsDBNull` 函数、 方法、方法 和 方法。These include the Visual Basic `IsDBNull` function, the method, the method, and the method. 不要将 `null` 面向对象的编程语言中的概念与 对象混淆。Do not confuse the notion of `null` in an object-oriented programming language with a object. 在面向对象的编程语言中， `null` 表示缺少对对象的引用。In an object-oriented programming language, `null` means the absence of a reference to an object. 表示未初始化的变量或不存在的数据库列。 represents an uninitialized variant or nonexistent database column. ## Examples 下面的示例调用 `DBNull.Value.Equals` 方法来确定联系人数据库中的数据库字段是否具有有效的值。The following example calls the `DBNull.Value.Equals` method to determine whether a database field in a contacts database has a valid value. 如果是这样，则将字段值追加到标签中的字符串输出。If it does, the field value is appended to the string output in a label. [!code-csharp[System.DBNull.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DBNull.Class/cs/DBNullExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DBNull.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DBNull.Class/vb/DBNullExamples.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持三种转换：如果 `type` 参数指定 或，则 返回值为当前的 对象本身。Three conversions are supported: If the `type` parameter specifies or , the return value is the current object itself. 如果 `type` 参数指定 ，则返回值为方法返回的字符串 。If the `type` parameter specifies , the return value is the string returned by the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly DBNull Value;
.field public static initonly class System.DBNull Value
Public Shared ReadOnly Value As DBNull
public: static initonly DBNull ^ Value;
staticval mutable Value : DBNull

summary.span: 表示 类的唯一实例。

span.span: Represents the sole instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是单一实例类，这意味着此类的此实例只能存在。 is a singleton class, which means only this instance of this class can exist. 如果某个数据库字段缺少数据，则可以使用 属性显式地将 对象值分配给该字段。If a database field has missing data, you can use the property to explicitly assign a object value to the field. 但是，大多数数据访问接口会自动执行此操作。However, most data providers do this automatically. 若要评估数据库字段以确定它们的值是否为 ，可以将字段值传递给 `DBNull.Value.Equals` 方法。To evaluate database fields to determine whether their values are , you can pass the field value to the `DBNull.Value.Equals` method. 但是，这种方法很少使用，因为有许多其他方法可用于计算缺少数据的数据库字段。However, this method is rarely used because there are a number of other ways to evaluate a database field for missing data. 其中包括 Visual Basic `IsDBNull` 函数、 方法、方法、方法以及 其他一些方法。These include the Visual Basic `IsDBNull` function, the method, the method, the method, and several other methods. ## Examples 下面的示例调用 `DBNull.Value.Equals` 方法来确定联系人数据库中的数据库字段是否具有有效的值。The following example calls the `DBNull.Value.Equals` method to determine whether a database field in a contacts database has a valid value. 如果是这样，则将字段值追加到标签中的字符串输出。If it does, the field value is appended to the string output in a label. [!code-csharp[System.DBNull.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DBNull.Class/cs/DBNullExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DBNull.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DBNull.Class/vb/DBNullExamples.vb#1)]
